# Rclone

## Overview

[Rclone](https://rclone.org) is an open-source, command-line program designed to manage files on remote storage.

<div class="grid grid--buttons" markdown data-search-exclude>

[:fontawesome-solid-book-open:**Manual**](https://rclone.org/docs){ .md-button .md-button--stretch }

[:fontawesome-solid-newspaper:**Releases**](){ .md-button .md-button--stretch }

[:fontawesome-solid-comments:**Community**](https://forum.rclone.org){ .md-button .md-button--stretch }

</div>

---
<!-- END SALTBOX MANAGED OVERVIEW SECTION -->

## Deployment

Saltbox dependency.

```shell
sb install rclone
```

## Usage

```shell
rclone
```
